sentences.sentence: One example of an autoimmune disease is rheumatoid arthritis.
sentences.translation: 类风湿性关节炎是自身免疫疾病的一种，患者常会出现疲劳感。

sentences.sentence: Rheumatoid arthritis is a painful condition that affects your joints.
sentences.translation: 风湿性关节炎是影响关节令人痛苦的疾病。

sentences.sentence: [font=Times New Roman]One example of an autoimmune disease is rheumatoid arthritis.
sentences.translation: 类风湿性关节炎是自身免疫疾病的一种，患者常会出现疲劳感。
